If you\'ve ever gotten annoyed with hearing the same repetitive sound every time you get a text, this app is for you.\n\n Select an installed pack. That\'s it! Now every time you receive a text message, you will hear a different, refreshing ringtone. Don\'t worry, the ringtone you hear when people call you will remain untouched. Your text ringtones won\'t make you think someone else got a text either. Instead, RingPack chooses ringtones from the pack you selected. Each pack holds ringtones that sound similar, but differ in subtle ways.
You can install more packs from the Android Market by clicking the "Get More!" button.
Longpress any 3rd party packs to delete them.

You can rotate on incoming Google Voice and Talk messages if you enable the Accessibility Hack. You must enable the check in RingPack\'s settings and on your phone in Settings -> Accessiblity -> RingPack.
Go to Settings (MENU key -> Settings) to re-enable this message at start-up. You can also change ringtone rotation settings and enable more features.
